summary: Fei Protocol, which late last year merged with Rari, announced a $10 million bounty should the funds be returned.
title: DeFi Lender Rari Capital/Fei Loses $80M in Hack
content: Decentralized finance (DeFi) platforms Rari Capital and Fei Protocol suffered a more-than-$80 million hack early Saturday.
This story is developing and will be updated.
